subtasks: Stretching before working in hot weather
Walking behind a tractor to align Polly Pipe in a field
Using a shovel to spread dirt over the Polly Pipe to prevent it from blowing away
Turning on the water supply lever to activate the irrigation system
Using a popper tool to create holes in the Polly Pipe for water distribution
Removing and properly disposing of the Polly Pipe after use
